Room.Name: Hafnia Boulevard/Rue Caledonia Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the center of the city. Hafnia Boulevard runs east and west from here, and Rue Caledonia is the wide street going from north to south.
Room.LongDescription: This is the central part of the city, and a small park is located in the center of the intersection. A statue and park benches are under beautiful lavender trees in flower. The natives say the trees flower all year long. The elves erected a statue to some of the adventurers from other races who helped them in their time of trouble with the dragons and the cowardly mountain trolls.
